name: CyberSouls
description:
CyberSouls is an isometric hack and slash shooter. Take the souls of your enemies and purchase new abilities and passive upgrades to help you in taking down a soulless corporation.

Please note, CyberSouls currently only supports the use of an Xbox controller to play.

Controls:

A - interact/accept
B - Punch Melee/exit upgrade menu
X - Sword Melee
Y - Sword Spin (When Unlocked)
LT - Aim
RT - Fire
RB - Unlocked ability
LB - Dash
Right Stick - Swivel when aiming
